archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Food and Agricultural Education Information System Reports [1981]-2001
did.abstract: Statistical data compiled by the Food and Agricultural Education Information System regarding college enrollment and degrees in such majors as Agriculture, Family and Consumer Science, Forestry, Home Economics, and Renewable Natural Resources.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Food and Agricultural Education Information System Reports must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Food and Agricultural Education Information System Reports, Ms 2008-094 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Food and Agricultural Education Information System Reports were donated to Special Collections in 2008.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the Food and Agricultural Education Information System Reports commenced in December 2008 and was completed in February 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Food and Agricultural Education Information System (FAEIS) is a program which compiles nationwide higher education data for the agricultural, food, human, life, natural resource, and veterinary sciences. These data include student enrollment, degrees awarded and placement at all degree levels and faculty salaries by rank and discipline. FAEIS was developed by the U.S. Department of Agriculture in 1983 and originally managed by Texas A & M University. Virginia Tech began managing FAEIS in 2002.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a set of reports compiled by the Food and Agricultural Education Information System. The reports consist of compiled data on higher education in the fields of agricultural, food, human, life, natural resource, and veterinary sciences. Included are such statistics as student enrollment, degrees awarded and placement at all degree levels as well as faculty salaries by rank and discipline. Dates covered by these reports span from 1971 to 1999.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by field of study, then by report type, then chronologically.
